scenes.background: Alex crosses his arms, looking impatient. Lily taps her pen on the table.
scenes.description: Alex, we need to ensure our plan is foolproof. Rushing won't help.

options.text: Combining your decisiveness with thorough checks could be our winning formula, Alex.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Alex's urgency while emphasizing the value of careful planning, demonstrating good emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: A quick break might help us come back with fresh perspectives.
options.analysis: You suggested taking a break to alleviate tension, showing strong self-regulation and social skills.

options.text: Mistakes are costly. Let's discuss the plan one more time to be sure.
options.analysis: You stressed the importance of careful planning, demonstrating strong self-regulation and motivation.
